title: 站点标题
title.short-placeholder: 如果没有指定短标题，将会使用站点标题
title.url-help:
When the title is clicked, send users to this address. If left blank, user will be sent to the forum index.
Note: This is not the external URL used in emails, etc. That is set by the url property in config.json
title.name: 您的社区名称
browser-title-help: 如果没有指定浏览器标题，将会使用站点标题
title-layout-help: 定义浏览器标题的布局，即{pageTitle} | {browserTitle}
description.placeholder: 关于您的社区的简短说明
keywords-placeholder: 描述您的社区的关键字（以逗号分隔）
logo.image-placeholder: 要在论坛标题上显示的 Logo 的路径
logo.url-help:
When the logo is clicked, send users to this address. If left blank, user will be sent to the forum index.
Note: This is not the external URL used in emails, etc. That is set by the url property in config.json
touch-icon.help: 推荐的尺寸和格式：512x512，仅限PNG格式。如果没有指定触摸图标，NodeBB将回退到站点图标。
maskable-icon.help: 推荐的尺寸和格式：512x512，仅限PNG格式。如果没有指定可遮蔽图标，NodeBB将回退到触摸图标。
outgoing-links.whitelist: 添加域名到白名单以绕过警告页面
background-color-help: 当网站安装为 PWA 时用于启动屏幕背景的颜色
undo-timeout-help: Some operations such as moving topics will allow for the moderator to undo their action within a certain timeframe. Set to 0 to disable undo completely.
